author: jukka
msg: JCR-2770: Initial size of ConcurrentCache depends on number of segments (available processors)
Use a smaller initial map size to avoid OOM problems

author: jukka
msg: Modify the LoginLogutTest to also access the root node. This makes for a minimal somewhat useful session interaction (who wants to open a session for doing nothing!) and gives a more accurate picture of the performance even when the implementation uses lazy loading for internal session resources.
